name: Caramelized Oatmeal Raisin Muffins
author: Chantal Pare'
summary: Why can't oatmeal muffins taste more like oatmeal cookies?  These do!  The trick is to first caramelize the oatmeal.  Enjoy the nice, deep oatmeal flavor.
directions: Preheat oven to 375  degrees F (190 degrees C)
Lightly grease a muffin pan, or use paper liners
Heat butter in a skillet over medium heat
Cook 2/3 cup oats, 1/3 cup brown sugar, cinnamon and allspice until golden brown
Stir in 2/3 cup water and remaining 1/3 cup brown sugar
Remove from heat and allow to cool
In a large bowl, combine flour, 1/3 cup uncooked oats, baking powder and wheat germ
Whisk together egg and evaporated milk
Make a well in the center of flour mixture, and pour in egg mixture and cooked oatmeal
Dredge raisins in 1 tablespoon flour, then fold into batter
Bake in preheated oven for 25 to 30 minutes
